title: Fix logo image not displaying on the site

requirements.summary: Debug and fix the logo image display issue by verifying the image file exists, checking path references in Navbar.tsx and HomePage.tsx, and ensuring proper static asset serving
acceptanceCriteria: The Reapers Asylum MC logo displays correctly in the Navbar component
The Reapers Asylum MC logo displays correctly in the HomePage hero section
The logo loads without 404 errors in the browser console
The logo is visible on both initial page load and after navigation

file_operations.description: Update the logo image reference to use the correct path frontend/public/assets/generated/reapers-asylum-logo.dim_400x400.png. Verify the img src attribute points to /assets/generated/reapers-asylum-logo.dim_400x400.png (the public path) and includes proper alt text. Add error handling or fallback if needed to debug loading issues.

Update the hero section logo image reference to use the correct path frontend/public/assets/generated/reapers-asylum-logo.dim_400x400.png. Verify the img src attribute points to /assets/generated/reapers-asylum-logo.dim_400x400.png (the public path) and includes proper alt text. Ensure the image styling and dimensions are appropriate for the hero section display.

requirements.summary: Ensure the logo image file exists at frontend/public/assets/generated/reapers-asylum-logo.dim_400x400.png and is properly included in the build/deployment process
acceptanceCriteria: The logo file exists at the correct path in the deployed application
The image can be accessed directly via its URL path
The build process includes the generated assets in the deployment bundle

file_operations.description: Ensure the generated logo image file frontend/public/assets/generated/reapers-asylum-logo.dim_400x400.png exists in the public assets directory. This file should be the Reapers Asylum MC logo featuring a grim reaper with crossed scythes, 'REAPERS ASYLUM' top rocker text, 'NOMADS' bottom rocker text, and 'MC' patch, rendered on transparent background with high contrast for dark backgrounds. Verify the file is accessible as a static asset at /assets/generated/reapers-asylum-logo.dim_400x400.png.
